Desc.entry: A voluntary organisation which aims to engage with young people aged 14-20 years to prevent offending. Also helps ex-offenders when they come out of prison. Aims to promote access to education and computers. Provides sporting activities and vocational training eg computer repair, mechanics, security personnel.

Langs.entry: Ahmaric, Arabic, Eriterian, Luganda, Pemba, Portuguese, Shona, Somali, Sudanese, Swahili, Zulu,

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
